name: UserInfo
description: Contains methods for obtaining information about the context user.

getdefaultcurrency().name: getDefaultCurrency
getdefaultcurrency().description: Returns the context user's default currency code for multiple currency organizations or the organization's currency code for single currency organizations.

getfirstname().name: getFirstName
getfirstname().description: Returns the context user's first name

getlastname().name: getLastName
getlastname().description: Returns the context user's last name

getname().name: getName
getname().description: Returns the context user's full name. The format of the name depends on the language preferences specified for the organization.

getorganizationname().name: getOrganizationName
getorganizationname().description: Returns the context organization's company name.

getprofileid().name: getProfileId
getprofileid().description: Returns the context user's profile ID.

getsessionid().name: getSessionId
getsessionid().description: Returns the session ID for the current session.

gettimezone().name: getTimeZone
gettimezone().description: Returns the current user’s local time zone.

getuitheme().name: getUiTheme
getuitheme().description: Returns the preferred theme for the current user. Use getUiThemeDisplayed to determine the theme actually displayed to the current user.

getuithemedisplayed().name: getUiThemeDisplayed
getuithemedisplayed().description: Returns the theme being displayed for the current user.

getuseremail().name: getUserEmail
getuseremail().description: Returns the current user’s email address.

getusername().name: getUserName
getusername().description: Returns the context user's login name.

getuserroleid().name: getUserRoleId
getuserroleid().description: Returns the context user's role ID.

iscurrentuserlicensed(string).name: isCurrentUserLicensed
iscurrentuserlicensed(string).overrideSignature: public static override Boolean isCurrentUserLicensed(String namespace)
iscurrentuserlicensed(string).description: Returns true if the context user has a license to any managed package denoted by the namespace. Otherwise, returns false.

iscurrentuserlicensedforpackage(id).name: isCurrentUserLicensedForPackage
iscurrentuserlicensedforpackage(id).overrideSignature: public static override Boolean isCurrentUserLicensedForPackage(ID packageID)
iscurrentuserlicensedforpackage(id).description: Returns true if the context user has a license to the managed package denoted by the package ID. Otherwise, returns false.

ismulticurrencyorganization().name: isMultiCurrencyOrganization
ismulticurrencyorganization().description: Specifies whether the organization uses multiple currencies.
